sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' class Canvas extends Component { constructor() { super() this.canvas = React.createRef() } componentDidMount() { const canvas = this.canvas.current const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d") ctx.strokeRect(0, 0, 100, 100) ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(10, 90) ctx.lineTo(40, 90) ctx.moveTo(25, 90) ctx.lineTo(25, 20) ctx.moveTo(25, 20) ctx.lineTo(70, 20) ctx.moveTo(25, 35) ctx.lineTo(40, 20) ctx.moveTo(70, 20) ctx.lineTo(70, 35) ctx.moveTo(75, 40) ctx.arc(70, 40, 5, 0, Math.PI * 2, false) ctx.moveTo(70, 45) ctx.lineTo(70, 60) ctx.closePath() ctx.stroke() } render() { return (
) } } export default Canvas
